pr_title: Mgmt: Fix ProviderRegistrationPolicy using a existing Providers endpoint

timeline.message: Use providers endpoint and remove ProviderRegistrationPolicy from default pipeline

timeline.bodyText:
Is it possible to still keep it (automatically set the provider, after auth done)?
It still provide a function that user sometimes needs (hence we got report on the bug).
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: If we want, we could set it inside ResourceManager constructor. If so, the AuthorizationManager will not has such function by default.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: Great. Remember to test it a bit (with some uncommon provider).
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Also added a check for null providers.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.message: set default Provider Registration Policy inside Resource Manager
